name: chartbrew
tagline: A self-hosted platform for building live dashboards from data sources
description: Chartbrew is a self-hosted platform for creating live dashboards and charts from databases and APIs. It allows scheduling syncs, building templates, team collaboration, and embedding visualizations anywhere via web UI.

features.title: REST API
features.description: Create real-time dashboards from databases and APIs. Dynamic visualization

features.title: Real-Time Sync
features.description: Automatic data updates at custom intervals. Always current

features.title: Analytics Dashboard
features.description: Share dashboards with team members. Collaborative analytics

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: Keep your analytics data private. Complete control
